title: Kyuss Font (One inch man & circus leaves town)
content:
Hi,   
   
Kyuss are one of my alltime fave bands (former band from Queen of the stone age guitarrist) and the always used free/dubious fonts on their layouts. Not that this is a beauty, but I've always wanted to know the name of it. Free font?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100823064911im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/29047.gif) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100823064911im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/29048.gif)
author: adriano
